subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore scored two goals and Juan Pablo Ángel added a goal and an assist on Sunday to lead the Red Bulls to a 3-0 victory against Toronto F.C.
snippet: Jozy Altidore scored two goals and Juan Pablo Ángel added a goal and an assist on Sunday to lead the Red Bulls to a 3-0 victory against Toronto F.C.
